Incorrect assessment. There are {{mistakeCount}} mistake(s).

exampleSubmission.saveSuccessful: Your example submission has been saved
exampleSubmission.readSuccessfully: You have successfully read and understood this example submission
exampleSubmission.selectModelExplanation: You can select the assessment training mode here. The assessment training mode defines how the tutor has to confirm that the example was understood.
